title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo with CLI, REST API, and Go library to pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama’s REST API, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI; supports sync/async chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM backend for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Popular open-source web UI (similar to ChatGPT) that connects to a local Ollama instance; supports multi-model chats, file uploads, and admin settings.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama.cpp wrapper)
summary: Native Go CLI that embeds go-llama.cpp for GPU-accelerated inference; lets users pull quantized models from a registry and run them with one command.

title: ollama-rb (Ruby gem)
summary: Community Ruby client for Ollama REST API, published as gem ‘ollama’; covers chat, generate, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-copilot (VS Code extension)
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement with inline autocomplete and chat sidebar.

title: ollama4j (Java/JVM library)
summary: Java library for Ollama REST API, available on Maven Central; supports chat, generate, embeddings, and listing models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and persistent model storage.

title: ollama-chatbot (Streamlit template)
summary: Minimal Streamlit chatbot template that uses the ollama-python package for local LLM conversations.

title: ollama-csharp (dotnet client)
summary: .NET community library that wraps Ollama REST endpoints; supports chat, generate, and model management in C#.

title: ollama-dagger (Dagger module)
summary: Official Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust (unofficial crate)
summary: Rust client for Ollama REST API, published on crates.io; offers async/await and typed model responses.

title: ollama-haystack (Haystack integration)
summary: Haystack integration that lets pipelines use Ollama models for query generation, summarization, and RAG.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stack with Ollama, CUDA runtime, and optional Open-WebUI for quick local deployment.

title: ollama-nest (NestJS module)
summary: Community NestJS module that injects an Ollama client as a provider for chat and embeddings in TypeScript backends.

title: ollama-php (Composer package)
summary: PHP client for Ollama REST API, installable via Composer; supports chat, generate, and listing local models.

title: ollama-rag (LlamaIndex template)
summary: Official LlamaIndex example showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings and chat models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that proxies channel messages to a local Ollama model and posts replies, useful for internal Q&A bots.
